t: Ridgeline Insights Ranked Among "50 Best Places to Work" by Outside Magazine
s: April 22, 2022 - The company rebranded in the first half of 2020 to better align with its expanded mission and increased capabilities as an Amazon Performance Agency. The new name also establishes distance between the professional agency and its successful direct-to-consumer brand of kids’ outdoor gear, LONE CONE.

t: How Annalisa DeMarta Built a #1 Amazon Brand - Deliberate Directions
s: January 9, 2025 - She’s the co-founder of Ridgeline insights, which is an Amazon performance agency, with over 16 million in sales on Amazon, as well as the founder of Lone Cone, a direct to consumer kids brand that maintains the number one kids rainboot on Amazon for the last three years.
